text: Cruachan Paorach is a hill in north County Waterford, Ireland. == Geography == The hill has a conical shape. Villages in its hinterland include Fews, Clonea- Power and Rathgormack. The hill is sometimes used to forecast weather as when there is low cloud on Cruachan, bad weather is reputedly on its way. ==References== Category:Mountains and hills of County Waterford
title: Cruachán Paorach
